content: @Brett Esler , just building the au implementation guide (though I have made some changes) - but my generated extensions are referencing a tbl_vjoin_slice.png that isn't in the set of images generated by the publisher.jar (other tbl_*.png are there). Have you noticed this in your work? Just wanted to check before I escalated..
this is in the tree view of the extension btw

have not noticed that one - have not used that image though... seems in profiles slices tree images are the following - have not got any examples of slice in an extension in AU base...
<img src="tbl_vjoin.png" alt="." style="background-color: inherit" class="hierarchy">
<img src="icon_slice.png" alt="." style="background-color: white; background-color: inherit" title="Slice Definition" class="hierarchy">
Hi Andrew - I have this problem too @Grahame Grieve are these images sourced by the IG builder? tbl_vjoin_slice.png seems to be missing

I found them somewhere (the github for the publisher? I can't remember) and then just copied them manually into the root of the pages/ folder. That works as a stop gap, but yes I think they are probably missing from the list that are included in the publisher jar
I have them (along with all the other SD images) in my IG project - I got them from the core build.
